reviews.content: everything works but the lock screen part does not show
Glitches on and off when unlocking phone & during phone calls
Works fully on music apps but on the lock screen the player BARELY moves at all, and before that I had a problem with it not showing up in the player, iPad Pro, 3rd Generation, 12.9”

‪Works perfectly in my iPhone XS Max iOS 12.1.1 ‬
‪Chimera 1.2.7‬
‪Sileo 1.3.1‬
‪Sileo beta ( Channel ) 1.3.2b1 ‬
‪Zebra 1.0~beta20-2 ‬
great tweak for Music player.. works on homescreen and lock screen.. just takes up a lot or Ram and makes my phone freeze or crash Sometimes
